text: geudeul-i eodiseo balgyeondoedeun geudeul-egeneun gul-yog-i saegimjil doeeossnola. geuleona hananim-eulobuteoui gyeyaggwa salamdeullobuteoui gyeyag-e uihal ttaeneun ye-oela. geudeul-eun hananim-eulobuteoui bunnoleul cholaehayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-egeneun ganan-i saegimjil doeeossnola. geuleoham-eun geudeul-i gyesoghaeseo hananim-ui jingpyodeul-eul bulsinhago seonjijadeul-eul budanghi salhaehaessgi ttaemun-ila. geuleoham-eun geudeul-i bulbogjonghan geos ttaemun-imyeo geudeul-i gyesoghaeseo gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseossgi ttaemun-ila
